question: Some people believe that there should be fixed punishment for each type of crime. Others, however, argue that the circumstances of an individual crime and the motivation for committing it, should always be taken into account when deciding on punishment. Discuss both views and give your opinion
text: A certain group of folks think imprisonment for crimes ought to be set depending on  kind of violent actions. However, opponents stated that situation of scandal must be considered before deciding the consequences.According to my personal opinion, I firmly believe that, some crimes deserve to be punished strictly but a few unintentional actions must be re-think before finalizing any serious consequences.
